document.full_text: a outbreak of equine herpes in at least six western u.s. states has forced the cancellation of scores of horse events, just as the prime season for riding shows, sales and rodeos is getting under way.
document.title: equine herpes outbreak hits western u.s. states
lines_and_colors: a outbreak of equine herpes in at least six western u.s. states has forced the cancellation of scores of horse events, just as the prime season for riding shows, sales and rodeos is getting under way.
